Class DbasePsql

Object
  DbasePsql

public class DbasePsql
extends Object

This is a set of static methods to convert databases DBase II, DBase III+, DBase IV and FoxProV2 into PostgreSQL.

Package Simple DBase SQL by Michael Lecuyer is used for accessing .dbf files.

Each .dbf file contains one table. For such table two files are created: one with suffix _cr.sql containing table structure in form of SQL statement CREATE TABLE and second with suffix _in.sql with data in form of COPY statement (COPY is much faster than INSERT). It is possible to modify table name and field names. Refer to properties file (default: dbasepsql.properties) for details.

Way of usage is described by example in DbasePsqlUse.java

Method Detail

exportDir

public static void exportDir(String inputDir,
                             String handler,
                             String dbEncoding,
                             Locale locale,
                             String outputDir,
                             String fileEncoding,
                             ResourceBundle rb)
                      throws SQLException,
                             IOException
Export all .dbf files from one directory.

Parameters:
inputDir - Path to the directory holding dbase tables.
handler - Memo handler class name.
dbEncoding - Encoding of dbase files.
locale - Locale for decimal symbol. Pass null for default settings.
outputDir - Path for creating .sql files.
fileEncoding - Encoding of .sql files
rb - Resource bundle for renaming tables and fields
Throws:
SQLException
IOException

convertCodePage

public static String convertCodePage(String str,
                                     String dbEncoding,
                                     String fileEncoding)
Performs character encoding. This is weird as .dbf file is opened using default system settings while real encoding for this file could be very strange. For example in Poland it is usually Mazovia: non-standard code page.

If dbEncoding is the same as fileEncoding then no conversion is made. Supported conversions:
mazovia -> windows-1250

Parameters:
str - String to be converted.
dbEncoding - Encoding of dbase files.
fileEncoding - Encoding of .sql files
Returns:
Converted string.

convertStr

public static String convertStr(String str,
                                char[] from,
                                char[] to)
Performs actual conversion.

Parameters:
str - String to be converted.
from - chars to be converted.
to - To that values chars would be converted.
Returns:
Converted string.

rb - Resource bundle for renaming tables and fields
